name: Beeline Bikes, Inc.
description: Provider of an online mobile bike shop intended to reinvent how people interact with bike shops. The company's bike shop includes a technology platform, support infrastructure and supply chain, enabling customers to schedule a visit at the time and location of their choosing.
one_liner: Provider of an online mobile bike shop intended to reinvent how people interact with bike shops. The company's bike shop includes a technology platform, support infrastructure and supply chain, enabling customers to schedule a visit at the time and location of their choosing.
